SubTranslateCaching.description: Boolean. Whether to enable caching for translation subpages.

SubTranslateCachingTime.description: Integer. The time in seconds to cache translations for.

SubTranslateLibreTranslateUrl.description: String. URL of the LibreTranslate instance to use.

SubTranslateRobotPolicy.description: String. The robot policy to use for translation subpages.

SubTranslateSuppressLanguageCaption.description: Boolean. Whether to suppress (disable) the language caption on translation subpages.

SubTranslateTimeout.description: Integer. The time in seconds before connecting to the LibreTranslate instance will timeout.

SubTranslateTranslateTitle.description: Boolean. Whether to also translate the page title. This will create an extra request to the translation API.
